info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 27 at 9:39AM CDT until October 28 at 4:36AM CDT by NWS New Orleans LA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi...
Bogue Chitto River Near Tylertown affecting Pike and Walthall Counties.
For the Bogue Chitto River...including Tylertown...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Bogue Chitto River near Tylertown.
* WHEN...Until late tonight.
* IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, The road through the middle of Hidden Springs Resort Park will begin to flood along with low-lying farm and pasture land near the river.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 16.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is near crest now, and is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations.
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 145 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT
